page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY GRAN
page.content: My grandma is 48 years old.She lives at 132 Glebe Street.My grandma gets up at 6.30 a.m. and has some toast or bacon and egg.At 7.30 a.m. she goes to work.She works at Castleford High School.My grandma is a cleaner.When she comes home at 9.30 a.m.she cleans up the house then has some tea.She puts my grandad's tea on one side for him to warm up.At 3.30 p.m. she goes back to work and she cleans the tables and floors.She comes home at 5.30 p.m.then she does her knitting. She is knitting my Auntie Jayne some tops.At 11.30 p.m.she goes to bed.My grandma does relief work when somebody is poorly.When she goes to work she cleans up the toilets.The toilet rolls were on fire.My grandma got some water and put the fire out.
